Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Reroute at Harlem/Forest Perserve-Cullom
ShortDescription: 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Montrose, Oak Park, Irving Park and Harlem due to, street blockage near Harlem/Forest Preserve-Cullom.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harlem, Montrose, Oak Park, Irving Park and Harlem due to, street blockage near Harlem/Forest Preserve-Cullom.

Allow extra travel time.
